review: I used generic Diphenhydramine HCL 25 mg capsule to help with runny nose, sore/scratchy throat and sneezing because of common cold. I took only one capsule before sleep at night. It made me sleepy right away. BUT it’s made me nauseated, helped with runny nose and sneezing. I don’t like that while I was asleep I kept feeling jittery.

Vicks QlearQuil Nighttime Allergy Relief (diphenhydramine):This did not work for me at all. I lay in bed for the third night in a row, congested and unable to sleep. Not sure why it doesn't work for me, but I am severely unsatisfied. No side effects, but no desired effects either.
Benadryl (diphenhydramine):I have a very bad cold and not getting much sleep. Took two Benadryl and feel much better.
Benadryl (diphenhydramine):Very good to dry up the drainage that makes that tickling in your throat.
Benadryl Allergy (diphenhydramine):Usually helps get a sound sleep.
